newsitem.title: USA: Pioneer Railcorp June carloadings up.
newsitem.headline: Pioneer Railcorp June carloadings up.

text.p: Pioneer Railcorp said Wednesday June carloadings rose 17 percent to 3,405, compared with carloadings of 2,907 in June 1996.

For the second quarter, carloadings increased 16 percent to 10,423 compared with 8,950 a year ago. For the first six months of the year, shipments rose 22 percent to a record 19,066 carloadings from 15,684 a year ago.

"Pioneer's record first half carloadings shipped is indicative of a year that is progressing very well for us," Guy Brenkman, chairman, said in a statement. "We continue to look at acquisitions and other strategies that will help the company to grow."
